divs: Sighting DetailsI was only a kid and my date might be off by a year or so, I think I was 7 or 8.I was in my backyard playing by myself when I saw a triangle shaped objectfloating close enough for me to get some detail. The strangest part was itwasnt flying flat, or fast. It seemed to be slow and rotating as it flew overme. I couldnt tell you if I watched it fly away or not. I do not remember.
Summary: trialngle shape, rotating about 100 feet off groun
